name: Apparitions of Our Lady of Beauraing
summary: Between November 29, 1932 and January 3, 1933, the Blessed Virgin Mary appeared 33 times to five children in Beauraing, Belgium. The apparition, known as the 'Virgin of the Golden Heart,' appeared in a hawthorn tree and delivered messages about prayer, penance, and conversion. Our Lady revealed her Immaculate Heart, which appeared as a golden heart. The apparitions were approved by the Church in 1949, and Beauraing became an important pilgrimage site in Belgium.
